data.title: MediaCoder (free) download Windows version
data.meta_description: Download MediaCoder for free. MediaCoder is a media transcoder software developed and maintained since 2005.
data.text:
MediaCoder is a great tool for anyone who needs to convert between different formats of multimedia files. It offers a wide range of options and can handle all popular formats, including MPG, VOB, AVI, RMVB, MOV, MP4, MP3, OGG, AAC, WAV, MKV, Xvid, DivX, H.264, MPEG, and more. It can also reduce the size of your audio and video files, extract audio tracks from movies, rip CD discs, and fix corrupted or partially downloaded video files. The user interface is intuitive and easy to use, making it a great choice for both beginners and experienced users. Highly recommended!

MediaCoder 0.8.65 was available to download from the developer's website when we last checked. We cannot confirm if there is a free download of this software available. MediaCoder is suitable for 32-bit and 64-bit versions of Windows XP/XP Professional/Vista/7/8/10/11.

Some of the tool aliases include "MediaCoder x64", "MediaCoder_051r8", "MediaCoder-0.7.2.4550". The common filenames for the program's installer are mediacoder.exe, cmd.exe, X3.EXE, VOICERDR.EXE or rundll32.exe etc. The most popular versions of the tool are 0.8, 0.7 and 0.6. MediaCoder lies within Multimedia Tools, more precisely Editors & Converters. The actual developer of the free software is Stanley Huang. We recommend checking the downloaded files with any free antivirus.
